main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed by military personnel at an Army Air Force base in the Azores on October 24, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as larger than a B-29 bomber, round in shape, and orange in color.
The object was observed to rise, fly flat, and then back up in different directions.
The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 4,000 feet and a distance of 3,000-3,500 yards from the observers.
The object was observed for approximately 3 minutes before disappearing.
No sound was heard coming from the object.
